vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Βαραββᾶς, -ᾶ, ὁ (Aram. בַּר־אַבָּא, lit., son of a father, i.e. accusative to Jerome, filius magistri),
Barabbas: Mat.27:16, 17 20, 21, 26, Mrk.15:7, 11 15, Luk.23:18, Jhn.18:40. (In Mat.27:16, some MSS. read Ἰησοῦν Β.; see WH, App., 19f.).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Barabbas, "son of a father" possibly "son of a rabbi"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.27.16
§ Barabbas, "son of a father" possibly "son of a rabbi"
Barabbas, (Proper name)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴拉巴 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在亞蘭文的意思是 "父親或主人的兒子"
被捕的強盜, 就是猶太人祈求彼拉多代替耶穌釋放的人
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴拉巴 这个阳性专有名词 人名在亚兰文的意思是 "父亲或主人的儿子"
被捕的强盗, 就是犹太人祈求彼拉多代替耶稣释放的人
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ba-ra-ba «Con của cha». Một tên trộm cướp đã nổi loạn và giết người trong đời Chúa Giê-su.
